title: Pillaimadam
text: Pillaimadam is a village of <a href="Ramanathapuram%20district">Ramanathapuram district</a>, Tamil Nadu state in India. The two place is important of Pillaimadam one of the nearest of vegetables garden and another place is nearest Ariyaman beach. <a href="Gulf%20of%20Mannar">Gulf of Mannar</a> area is a Pillaimadam. Pillaimadam is nearest to <a href="Vedalai">Vedalai</a>. <a href="Sundaramudayan">Sundaramudaiyan</a> post -623519 Ramanathapuram district, Tamil Nadu state, India.
